channel.title: Keep player from switching equiped items?
channel.description:
How can I make it where I can prevent the player from wearing another item if he/she has one on already?
(I got a ring I want players to keep on in certain areas. I got it fixed so players can't take off the ring but I don't know how to fix ring switching)

item.title: Keep player from switching equiped items?
item.dc:creator: @Dart_Zamaki Dart Zamaki
item.description:
@Dart_Zamaki wrote:

There’s gotta be a way. I mean, yea, the client.java is A BIG file, but theres gotta be a area where when the mouse presses a item its equiped or not.

Read full topic
item.source: Keep player from switching equiped items?
